name: Cook the Book: Grape, Almond and Radicchio Salad with Black Olives
description: This Grape, Almond and Radicchio Salad with Black Olives from Eric Ripert's Avec Eric pairs radicchio and endive with crunchy, salty almonds, and juicy, sweet green grapes for a salad that alternates bites of bitter leafiness with more friendly sweet and salt. Feel free to replace the radicchio with escarole, swap the grapes for orange segments, or trade almonds for walnuts.
recipeIngredient: 1 head radicchio, cut into bite-size pieces
1 head Belgian endive, cut into bite-size pieces
1/2 cup green grapes, cut in half
1/2 cup whole almonds, toasted and lightly chopped
Fine sea salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Place the radicchio and endive in a large bowl and add the black olives, grapes and almonds. Dress the salad with the balsamic vinegar and olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Toss to coat and serve immediately.
